summary: The Ecosystem Architecture blog series delves into the application of biological and network principles to non-natural and decentralized organizations. Highlighting the pitfalls of current tech industry practices, it emphasizes regenerative designs and shaping desired over expected futures. It advocates for resilient structures across various domains, from technology to internet freedoms.
excerpt: The Ecosystem Architecture blog series explores biological ecosystem principles in non-natural, decentralized organizations. It emphasizes regenerative designs and the pursuit of desired futures.
